attributes.action: Scrap testing for the unvaccinated to travel abroad for holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Testing the unvaccinated to go on holiday abroad is discrimination.
attributes.background: I would like to see the government to scrap the unvaccinated to test to go on holiday abroad like the vaccinated and stop discrimination against the unvaccinated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extend rules for UK travel for vaccinated travellers to unvaccinated travellers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597783

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
